last_green_gate.notes: Gate stabilized for consumer hardware: /chat ping timeout raised to 120s. Gateway /metrics plans_saved_total + last_plan_id are restart-safe via filesystem scan of .runtime/plans.

STEP 0.1.description: Masterplan documents for user and supervisor

STEP 0.3.description: Base configuration files and initial config system

STEP 1.1.description: Kernel + Gateway running on 127.0.0.1:10010 with ops gates and stable contracts (health, health/llm, metrics, chat). Metrics are restart-safe.

STEP 2.1.description: Agent system becomes REAL: AgentFactory/Runtime/Comm integrated and used by MasterAgent via plan step types

STEP 3.1.description: ToolRouter + canonicalization + baseline tools REAL; hooks/statistics expansion pending

STEP 4.1.description: RAGEngine wired; full ingest/query tool suite + benchmarks pending

STEP 5.1.description: Graph + Cross-Memory Search REAL and used in planner decisions

STEP 6.1.description: Self-improvement feedback logging REAL + self-improve agent + strategy application

STEP 7.1.description: Ecosystem tools exist; completeness + safety hardening pending

STEP 8.1.description: Evaluation/benchmarks + stabilization beyond current ops gates

STEP 9.1.description: Policy optimization (RL-light): reward schema + policy layer influencing planner/tools

ops_contracts.notes: Gate /chat uses 120s timeout to allow cold-start/JIT model load on consumer hardware.

gateway_entrypoint.notes: Only external entry point; /metrics uses filesystem scan of .runtime/plans for restart-safe plans_saved_total and last_plan_id.

core_package_init.notes: No side-effect imports; wiring is explicit via gateway_init_.py and core/kernel/*.

kernel_master_agent.notes: Planner-driven orchestration; tool execution exclusively via ToolRouter; checkpoints via PlanStateStore.

tool_router.notes: All tool execution flows through ToolRouter.

tool_canonicalization.notes: Single source of truth for canonicalization.

memory_os.notes: Used by MasterAgent; cross-memory/graph integration pending (Phase 5).

rag_engine.notes: Used by MasterAgent; full RAG suite/benchmarks pending.
